story_30_06000/2401_1001_0200_10:
We’re here to escort you to the award ceremony.
Come with us. It’ll be starting soon.
story_30_06000/2401_1001_0300_10:
There’s gonna be a huuuuge announcement, too!
So, like, get excited for that!
story_30_06000/2401_1001_0400_10: A huge announcement? I wonder what it could be.
story_30_06000/2401_1001_0500_10: Hehe. You’ll just have to wait and seeee!
